backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, Fyers credentials, symbol lists, and status checks with access‑controlled operations stored per‑principal.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a dashboard index‑performance feature and listing related frontend files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components, pages, hooks, constants, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling theme setup, auth gating, profile modal, navigation, and routing between dashboard and settings.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling sign‑in state, errors, cache clearing, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name, using query hooks and form submission with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks content until Internet Identity is loaded and signed in, showing a login card when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/IndexP: Card displaying sorted index performance data with percent change indicators, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/FyersConnectionF: React form for viewing connection status and saving or clearing Fyers API credentials with validation and toast feedback.
Main layout with header, navigation, and user profile display, adapting for mobile and using Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/results/OiMetric: Cell component showing OI change value with color coding and label, or a fallback when data is missing.
frontend/src/components/results/Qualific: Badge rendering qualification status with corresponding colors and icons.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultsT: Sortable table listing derivatives with status, candle metrics, and OI changes, supporting bull or bear sorting logic.
frontend/src/components/SymbolUniverseEd: Editor for uploading, editing, counting, and saving per‑user symbol lists with file upload and validation.
frontend/src/constants/scan.ts: Defines the minimum scan interval constant set to 5000 ms.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFyersConnection.ts: Hooks for reading status and saving or clearing Fyers API credentials through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useIndexPerformance.t: Hook fetching index performance data from the backend actor, refreshing periodically and handling missing methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScanResults.ts: Implements hooks to fetch scan results and timestamps and trigger new scans with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSymbolUniverse.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the symbol universe list through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode, and base styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing scan results, status indicators, and a scan trigger with various error and cooldown handling.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Displays settings UI with tabs for configuring Fyers API credentials and managing the symbol universe.
Contains helper functions for labeling derivative properties and deriving levels from candle data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors, fonts, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and feature list for an Android app that analyzes F&O data, qualification rules, and dashboard metrics.
